name: Skuiggle
description:
Have fun! Create Art! Art is great!

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD & Arrow Keys (2 player mode) to move around

Escape to quit

On the starting screen, press '1' for single player mode, '2' for two player mode

Once you'rt done, press 'S' to save all paintings from your previous session, 'D' deletes them

Gamepad (only XInput controllers are fully supported, DirectInput might lead to strangeness)

Analogue Stick/Dpad to move around. In two player mode, the right analogue stick of the first controller also controls the second player, while the one on the second controller (if plugged in) controls player one. Theoretically you can play the game with sharing just one controller...

On the starting screen 'A' (Xbox controller) activates single player mode, 'B' activates two player mode.

Once you'rt done, pressing 'A' saves your painting, while pressing 'B' deletes them.

Your paintings are saved in your [username]\appdata\local\Skuiggle folder.

Options:
press the following keys on your keyboard to toggle certain things on, or off:

Screenshake on/off: 'U' 
Sound on/off: 'i'
music on/off: 'o'

Credits:

Programming, Design, Art: Eric Merz

Music & Sound: Eli Rainsberry
